description:
The Hoshi Festival executive committee has finally gathered all its members.
As the committee is making steady progress, third-year Tatewaki Rintaro must take an important exam that will determine his future.
Rintaro will return after he passes his exam.
With full faith in himm, Kohana and the others quietly watch his progress.
Meanwhile, Rintaro faces his work alone.
However, with hazy feelings in his heart, he finds himself unable to identify what he wants to make.
Source: crunchyroll
